main event: Military personnel observed a single unidentified object at Barksdale AFB, Louisiana on August 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object was visually observed for less than 1 minute.,The object appeared to have the characteristics of a falling or exploding meteor or missile.,Only one military witness confirmed the sighting.,The weather conditions at the time were clear and cloudless.,No photographs or physical evidence were obtained from the sighting.
sighted object: one unidentified object in the sky
